name: Food And Drink 17 - Fruit Multiple Choice Quiz | Fruit and Vegetables | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following fruits is a drupe?
Seckel, Jargonelle and Doyenne Du Comice are varieties of what type of fruit?
Which fruit is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Fig.

	All the others are dried grapes.

questions.text: Is a Baldwin an apple or a pear?
questions.explanation:
Both.

	While most people would primarily associate Baldwins with apples, there also is a pear variant to that name.

questions.text: Which fruit is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Pear.

	All the rest are types of plums.

questions.text: Is a Bartlett an apple or a pear?
What is Gravenstein a variety of?

questions.correct: On a flower, 3 to 6 feet high
options: On a bush, at ground level
On a tree, over 15 feet high
questions.explanation: On a flower, 3 to 6 feet high.

questions.text: Is a Pippin an apple or a pear?
Pears are members of the rose family.
